Package org.newsclub.net.unix

Class ThroughputTest

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.newsclub.net.unix.SocketTestBase
      • org.newsclub.net.unix.ThroughputTest
  • @TestMethodOrder(org.junit.jupiter.api.MethodOrderer.MethodName.class)
public class ThroughputTest
extends SocketTestBase
    This test measures throughput for sending and receiving messages over AF_UNIX, comparing implementations of junixsocket and JEP 380 (Java 16). The test is enabled by default, and also included with the self-test. The tests can be configured as follows (all system properties):
    • org.newsclub.net.unix.throughput-test.enabled (0/1, default: 1)
    • org.newsclub.net.unix.throughput-test.payload-size (bytes, e.g., 65536)
    • org.newsclub.net.unix.throughput-test.seconds (default: 0)
    Author:
    Christian Kohlschütter
